channel.title: Yazid Janati El Idrissi
channel.description: Recent content on Yazid Janati El Idrissi

item.description: I am a second year PhD candidate in statistics at Télécom SudParis - Institut Polytechnique de Paris, advised by Sylvain Le Corff (LPSM, Sorbonne Université) and Yohan Petetin (CITI, Télécom SudParis). Previously I completed an engineering degree in applied Mathematics at Télécom SudParis. I am mainly interested in Monte Carlo methods (importance sampling, sequential monte carlo, MCMC), the theory behind and their synergy with variational inference. These days i am mostly working on finding efficient proposals for importance sampling through the minimization of divergence measures.
